short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TubeMellow makes YouTube browsing smoother, distraction-free, multi-lingual, and offers a mellowed-out video experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Distraction-Free YouTube Experience

Take control of your YouTube browsing with TubeMellow, the Chrome extension that helps you stay focused by hiding unnecessary content like recommended videos, comments, and sidebars and Save your favourite Youtube links in your local drive. 

Whats new in v0.5.2:
- Add Bookmarks feature
- Add Support me Link
- Reduce file size
- Fix bugs and improved UI

Transform your YouTube experience into a cleaner, more productive space.
Download Now and enjoy distraction-free browsing!
